snippet: Pop open a bottle of Heinz. Hold it over the burger. Squirt. The entire process of ketchup-to-burger transfer takes me about three seconds. So why would you make your own?
abstract: Pop open a bottle of Heinz. Hold it over the burger. Squirt. The entire process of ketchup-to-burger transfer takes me about three seconds. So why would you make your own?

headline.main: Heinz vs. Homemade: A Gastronomic Throwdown
